timeline.message: added default cases to switch statements
moved default cases to end of switch statement
converted 2 case switch statements to if statements

timeline.bodyText: Although it will fall through and likely work, isn't it good practice to use break after default?
timeline.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText: For the reasons mention in this answer I'd agree with adding a break at the end; for consistency - i.e. The Principle of Least Surprise
replies.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText: This has now been done. I applied to a few extra files that also didn't have breaks in the default case
replies.author: antares1470

timeline.message: added break statements to default switch cases
fixed some code smells that came up from pull request
